item.title: Privacy & Cookie Policy
item.author: james@chilli.ai (James)
item.description: blog.chilli.ai Privacy & Cookie Policy This site does not use tracking or advertising No cookies are set by the website; so there’s no cookie consent message. This site uses hugo as a static site builder. My site is specifically configured to disable all services as outlined here: https://gohugo.io/about/hugo-and-gdpr There’s no linking within the the site or the code back to advertisers for tracking purposes. The following information is logged within Amazon AWS which I use to host this site:
